FaviGrab: Favicon Grabber - Instantly Download Website Icons
Easily capture and save favicons from any website with FaviGrab! This lightweight extension allows you to:

- Instantly grab the favicon of your current tab
- Download high-quality favicons in PNG format
- Save time on icon retrieval for web projects or collections
- Organize website icons with automatic site-name labeling
- Download in 4 different sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48, 64x64)
- Now has Dark Mode
- Now available to download in ICO format

Perfect for web developers, designers, and anyone who needs quick access to website icons. FaviGrab simplifies the process of obtaining favicons, eliminating the need for manual searches or complex tools.

How it works:
Go the site, you want the Favicon for
Open the extension while on any website
Click "Download Favicon" to save it as a PNG or ICO file

Streamline your workflow and enhance your projects with FaviGrab - your go-to tool for effortless favicon acquisition!
Download FaviGrab now and start collecting website icons with ease!

Let us know of any features you would like to see!
